::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod, still helping carry Scythe, to a containment room, looks at
Savanna.
"No, we got him."

::Drillbitt::

Drillbitt walks in to Megatrons base, woundering why he didn't recieve a
reply.
"Hello, any Predicon's in the house? I'm here to serve Megatron."
